name: PandaAttacker
description:
PandaAttacker - FREE. Hard Close 'Panda' Combat Action Game.

This game is by operating the cute panda, and defeat the enemy panda.
There are a lot of stage and level. And has many kinds of panda.
Panda wings grew. Big Boss Panda. Red and Blue Panda. etc...
But that's hard to clear!!.It's close combat action game.
You take a befind or side of the enemy. And attack!!.

HOW 2 PLAY.

  • PUSH 'START'
  • CHOOSE UNLOCKED STAGE AND LEVEL
  • Play Start.

FEATURES:

  • Automatic saving
  • Kind of attacks. ( Rolling ,Punch,Horn )
  • 10 Levels per 5 Stages.
  • Kind of Stages Night, Ice(Slip!!) , Mountain,
  • Kind of Enemy (Spring, Ball Shooter, Big Boss, etc)

PLAY TIPS:

  • Some kind of enemy. You are close to the enemy, Enemy attack You.
  • Sensor of enemy has blind spot. Enemy name is hint.
  • You will close to the enemy. and attack!. attack!. attack!
